Name: MeDo by Baidu
Tagline: Build full-stack apps with AI at a fraction of the cost
Topics: Website Builder, Artificial Intelligence, Vibe coding
Description: MeDo uses agentic AI to build production‑ready full‑stack apps — frontend, backend, database and integrations — in minutes. By automating code, infra and wiring, MeDo slashes development time and hosting costs so you can ship high‑quality MVPs at a fraction of the cost.

Name: Extra Thursday
Tagline: Chat with your inbox. Ask questions, draft, summarize – fast
Description: Imagine if ChatGPT lived deep inside your inbox — and handled anything you asked. Extra Thursday brings that to life. Chat with your entire inbox instead of one thread at a time. Ask broad questions, track open loops, find who’s waiting on you, and draft polished replies in seconds. Powered by deep-context AI that reads and understands your conversations, Thursday helps you summarize, search, and send thousands of personalized emails — effortlessly.

Name: GitLaw Agent
Tagline: AI that drafts and reviews legal documents for free
Description: Chat with GitLaw to instantly draft contracts, review legal documents and understand terms in plain English. • Lawyer-vetted templates customised at AI speed • Understand legal documents in simple terms • One seamless workflow Start for free to cut the time wasted and money lost on legal busywork.

Name: Context Link
Tagline: Personal URLs for sharing context with AI
Description: We built Context Link to make AI tools know what you already know. Connect your docs, Notion pages, or sites once, then share your personal link with ChatGPT/Claude/Copilot. It’ll search your sources semantically by meaning and return just the right snippets (in an AI friendly markdown format). Great for marketing, customer support and technical questions. Internally we use it both programatically and in chat bot sessions.

Name: Apple App Store
Tagline: Find apps & games for iPhone, iPad, Mac & more — on the web
Description: You can now get the full App Store experience right in your browser, with dedicated pages for the iPhone, iPad, Mac, Vision, Watch, and TV app libraries. Previously, Apple’s “apps.apple.com” domain simply redirected you to a generic page about the App Store on Apple’s website. Now, it takes you to a full-fledged version of the App Store you can browse on your computer.

Name: Agora Store Builder
Tagline: Vibe code an e-commerce store with distribution built-in
Description: Build your AI-powered e-commerce store in minutes. We help you launch a store with built-in features like domain setup, payments, order tracking, analytics, apps, templates, and more. No coding or effort needed.

Name: Perch
Tagline: Dynamic Island for Mac Notch
Description: Transform your Mac's notch into a powerful productivity hub. Chat with Apple Intelligence right from your notch. Completely on-device, private, and unlimited—no internet required. Media controls, live weather, camera access, and calendar. Predefined timers and stopwatch for Pomodoro sessions, cooking, or any time tracking needs. Store text snippets and access your complete clipboard history. Quick-access notepad for capturing thoughts instantly. Temporary staging area for files.

Name: Blindspot
Tagline: Book 2.5M+ billboards worldwide like you book an Uber
Description: Imagine your ads in Times Square or anywhere else in the world. Blindspot lets you pick the exact billboards you want, the hours you need with a creative that works, swapped in real-time when the weather, traffic, or crowd changes. Spots are as low as $1/hour.

Name: FlowBot
Tagline: Whatsapp automation with no-code AI chatbot builder
Description: Flowbot turns WhatsApp automation into a conversation. Describe what you want — Flowbot builds it instantly. Boost engagement and automate customer workflows effortlessly in 2025.

Name: ROAARRR
Tagline: Simple growth analytics. Know your funnel.
Description: Stop juggling multiple analytics platforms. ROAARRR shows your funnel from awareness to retention in one simple tool.

Name: Arcitext.com
Tagline: Write in your voice. Perfect it with AI.
Description: Write faster, without breaking character. Arcitext analyzes your text and extracts your brands or personal writing fingerprint. Next it acts as your personal writing coach and content strategist. Lock in your writing style, and get help from AI only when you need it, and free your creativity.

Name: Snyk Studio
Tagline: Real-time security guardrails for your AI code assistant
Description: Stop insecure AI code before it lands. Snyk Studio plugs into your AI code assistants (and VS Code, Cursor, and others) to scan code suggestions in real time, flag risky patterns, and guide safer fixes by these coding agents. Snyk Studio also injects Snyk’s security expert context so your assistant can plan and apply fixes to existing vulnerabilities without ever leaving the editor and terminal.

Name: Nexorify
Tagline: Create reminders & calendar events instantly by speaking
Description: Nexorify turns your voice into instant reminders and calendar events — no typing, no friction. Just say, “Create a calendar event tomorrow from 10 to 11 AM, ‘Meeting with a colleague,’ and remind me 30 minutes before,” or “Remind me to send the report in 2 hours.” Nexorify does the rest. It removes the gap between thought and action — built for people who talk faster than they type.

Name: Alpha Vantage MCP
Tagline: Have a natural-language conversation with financial markets
Description: Ask your LLMs or agentic tools anything you want about the market. In 30-seconds, connect your favorite LLM to our live financial market data, which covers real-time equities, options chains, crypto, FX, commodities, fundamentals, economic indicators, and 50+ technical signals. Then one-shot your analysis.

Name: SpotiDost
Tagline: Friendly Spotify 2 Mp3 Downloader, Playlist, Album Converter
Description: SpotiDost is a fast and simple Spotify to MP3 downloader for tracks, albums and playlists. Paste a Spotify link, click Download, and grab the songs you love. Currently SpotiDost supports Single Tracks, Playlists & Album Songs! You can download unlimited number of Spotify Songs using our tool.

Name: FOLO
Tagline: India's 1st NetWorth App
Description: FOLO is your one secure place to see, understand, and grow your NetWorth together with your family. It brings everything you own and everything you owe together in real time to build your complete NetWorth. You can share it, leverage it, or prepare it for generational transfer, all in the most secure and easy-to-use environment. We make better financial choices when we have clarity. Built with design clarity, absolute privacy, and real-time computation, FOLO is India’s first NetWorth App.

Name: Euverify GDPR Representative(Article 27)
Tagline: Appoint your Article 27 GDPR Representative in the UK & EU
Description: Appoint your GDPR Article 27 Representative in the EU and UK with Euverify. Handle regulator inquiries, DSARs, and maintain your ROPA automatically — all in one secure dashboard designed for effortless global compliance.

Name: Visibility by Causo
Tagline: See what AI models understand about your business
Description: Visibility by Causo measures how AI systems understand your company. It runs structured scans through ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and Perplexity to show what each model knows about your startup, where gaps exist, and how to fix them.

Name: AlterBase
Tagline: Find better alternatives to expensive software
Description: Discover budget-friendly alternatives to expensive software and tools. Compare features, pricing, and find the perfect tool for your needs. Submit and explore 1000+ alternatives.

Name: RFP Generator by SparrowGenie
Tagline: Create professional RFP's in minutes
Description: Generate complete RFPs in minutes using secure AI or build them manually with guided control.
